description.value:
RequirementsÂ You must be wielding your scarf in both hands.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Trip you.

As long as you are not wearing Heavy Armor and you are in this stance, you gain an extra +1 item bonus to your AC that adds to your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.dDIPA1WE9ESF67EB]{Explorer's Clothing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mystic Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.02q8s6sSicMkhs1l]{Bands of Force}, or any light or medium armor you are wearing, including armor potency runes.
